command: ffmpeg -i output.mp3 -i output.png -map 0 -map 1 -map_metadata -1 -c:a copy -id3v2_version 3 -metadata title="{title}" -metadata genre="{lyrics}" -metadata artist="{artist}" "{output_name}".mp3
